item.title: 微软和 Meta 因人工智能支出狂潮面临投资者质疑
item.description: 随着人工智能军备竞赛丝毫没有放缓的迹象，一些大型科技公司的财报季已演变成资本支出季。【原文：Earnings season for a handful of megacap tech firms has morphed into capex season with the AI arms race showing no signs of slowing.】

item.title: VF 公司扭亏为盈，业绩大幅增长
item.description: VF 公司公布的第一财季盈利超出华尔街预期，表明扭亏为盈的努力正在显现成效，VF 公司股价随之飙升。【原文：VF Corp. shares soared after the the apparel and shoe company reported fiscal first-quarter earnings that beat Wall Street expectations, signaling that turnaround efforts are showing results.】

item.title: Humana 因医疗保险优势业务增长而上调指导价
item.description: Humana Inc.周三上调了今年的利润指导，一反美国医疗保险行业的趋势，因为最近几个月大多数其他公司都下调了预测。【原文：Humana Inc. raised its profit guidance for the year on Wednesday, bucking a trend in the US health insurance industry after most other companies cut their forecasts in recent months.】

item.title: Glencore 合资公司收购巨型石油储存基地，未来将有盈余
item.description: 当市场正在为预期的供过于求做准备时，一家 Glencore Plc 合资企业正在收购非洲最大的石油储存基地。【原文：A Glencore Plc joint venture is buying into Africa’s biggest oil storage site at a time when the market is bracing for an expected oversupply.】

item.title: 邦吉公司第二季度利润降至2018年以来最低点
item.description: 由于关税和美国生物燃料政策的不确定性持续存在，给农作物贸易商和加工商造成压力，邦吉全球公司（Bunge Global SA）第二季度利润降至七年来最低。【原文：Bunge Global SA’s second-quarter profits fell to the lowest in seven years as lingering uncertainty over tariffs and US biofuel policy continued to pressure crop traders and processors.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦在通胀忧虑中保持基准利率稳定
item.description: 巴基斯坦央行连续第二次会议维持基准利率稳定，在通胀风险上升和关税不确定性挥之不去的情况下选择了谨慎行事。【原文：Pakistan’s central bank held its benchmark interest rate steady for a second consecutive meeting, choosing caution amid rising inflation risks and lingering tariff uncertainty.】

item.title: 股票投资者现在最喜欢鸽派的美联储
item.description:
货币政策可能是股市所剩无几的风险之一

Monetary policy might be among the few risks left for the stock market

】

item.title: 韩国总统李明博为与美国达成协议而做出让步，可能招致农民的愤怒
item.description: 在首尔南部一个闷热的牛棚里，苍蝇在数百头奶牛身上飞来飞去，这里是美国和韩国贸易谈判的中心地带。【原文：In a sweltering cattle shed south of Seoul, flies dart across hundreds of cows sitting at the heart of a trade talks between the US and South Korea.】

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普的 50%关税威胁让巴西央行头疼不已
item.description: 预计唐纳德-特朗普最快将于本周对巴西征收 50%的关税，这将对巴西央行长期保持高利率的策略提出考验。【原文：Brazil central bank’s strategy to keep interest rates high for a prolonged period will be put to the test by the 50% tariffs Donald Trump is expected to slap on the country as soon as this week.】

item.title: 中国准备在 4.8 万亿美元人工智能市场争夺战中击败美国
item.description: 在上海举行的中国人工智能旗舰会议上，仿人机器人在拳击场上一决高下，与此同时，一场中美科技大战也在附近的西装店打响，争夺谁能制定人工智能时代的规则。【原文：While humanoid robots faced off in a boxing ring at China’s flagship artificial intelligence conference in Shanghai, a fight in the US-China tech war was fought in suits nearby over who gets to set the rules in the AI age.】

item.title: SK 集团计划融资 58 亿美元重组能源部门
item.description: SK 集团计划在今年年底前融资 8 万亿韩元（约合 58 亿美元），对这家韩国企业集团的能源部门进行彻底改革，并帮助其偿还大部分债务。【原文：SK Group is planning raise 8 trillion won ($5.8 billion) by the end of the year to overhaul the South Korean conglomerate’s energy units and help pay off much of their debt.】

item.title: 大亨们因 19 亿美元乌克兰私人银行欺诈案在英国败诉
item.description: 乌克兰大亨们在伦敦法院就国有银行 Privatbank PJSC 损失数十亿美元的欺诈案做出的裁决中败诉。【原文：Ukrainian tycoons lost a London court ruling over a fraud that cost the state-owned lender Privatbank PJSC billions.】

item.title: 贸易乐观之后，全球股市反弹面临美联储的现实考验
item.description: 对于受贸易乐观情绪推动的全球股市而言，美联储周三宣布的利率可能会及时提醒人们，货币政策仍对涨势构成风险。【原文：For global stocks riding the wave of trade optimism, the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate announcement on Wednesday is likely to serve as a timely reminder that monetary policy still presents a risk to the rally.】

item.title: S&P 500 的旗帜性反弹面临今年最糟糕的两个月
item.description: S&P 500 指数在经历了 2020 年以来的最佳连涨后，即将进入历史上最艰难的一年。【原文：The S&P 500 Index, coming off its best streak of gains since 2020, is about to enter what has historically been its toughest stretch of the year.】

item.title: 可口可乐收购尼日利亚果汁制造商 CHI 六年后将其出售
item.description: 可口可乐公司达成了出售尼日利亚食品生产商 CHI 有限公司的协议，该公司六年前被可口可乐公司收购，旨在扩大其在非洲人口最多国家的业务。【原文：Coca-Cola Co. reached a deal to sell CHI Ltd., a Nigerian food producer that it bought six years ago in a bid to expand its offerings in Africa’s most populous nation.】

item.title: Verizon 的两部分债券增加了创纪录的反向扬基债券供应量
item.description: 威瑞森通信公司（Verizon Communications Inc.【原文：Verizon Communications Inc. is adding to a record year of so-called reverse yankee supply with a two-part sale that marks its first foray into Europe’s debt market in nearly a year and a half.】

item.title: 特斯拉供应商松下撤回电动汽车电池扩产计划
item.description: 特斯拉公司的供应商松下控股公司（Panasonic Holdings Corp）取消了其位于堪萨斯州的锂离子电池工厂产能提升的目标日期，为其核心支柱业务踩下了刹车。【原文：Tesla Inc. supplier Panasonic Holdings Corp. removed the target date for a capacity ramp up at its lithium-ion battery factory in Kansas, putting the brakes on a core pillar of its business.】

item.title: Amplifon 因收入不佳和指导性目标下调而创下历史最大跌幅
item.description: 助听器专家 Amplifon SpA 公布了不及预期的季度业绩，并下调了业绩指导，盘中跌幅高达 27%，创下历史最大跌幅。【原文：Hearing-aid specialist Amplifon SpA slid as much as 27% for its biggest intraday loss on record after reporting worse-than-expected quarterly results and cutting guidance.】

item.title: 国债在美联储和再融资结果出炉前保持稳定
item.description: 在美联储公布货币政策结果和备受关注的季度退款公告之前，国债普遍维持了前一天的强劲涨势。【原文：Treasuries broadly held on to the prior day’s strong gains ahead of the Federal Reserve’s monetary-policy outcome and a closely-watched quarterly refunding announcement.】

item.title: 新兴市场交易平淡，美联储和关税的不确定性构成影响
item.description: 由于美联储的政策动向、即将到来的关税最后期限以及假日季节的来临等不确定因素，许多投资者保持观望，新兴市场股票和货币变化不大。【原文：Emerging-market stocks and currencies were little changed as many investors stayed on the sidelines amid uncertainties including the Federal Reserve’s policy moves, an impending tariff deadline and the onset of the holiday season.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁加征关税，印度期待在秋季最后期限前与美国达成协议
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士称，即使美国总统唐纳德-特朗普本周继续威胁征收关税，印度官员也计划继续与美国谈判，以便在今年秋季之前达成双边贸易协议。【原文：Indian officials are planning to continue negotiating with the US for a bilateral trade deal by fall of this year even if US President Donald Trump follows through with threatened tariffs this week, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 欧洲央行工资跟踪报告预示明年薪资压力将降温
item.description: 欧元区的工资增长将在明年初大幅放缓，这进一步证明欧洲中央银行已经重新控制住了通货膨胀。【原文：Wage growth in the euro zone is set to slow sharply into the beginning of next year, adding to evidence that the European Central Bank has brought inflation back under control.】

item.title: 恒生银行股价在物业减值飙升后下挫
item.description: 汇丰控股有限公司控制的香港贷款机构恒生银行有限公司上半年减值骤增，因为香港商业地产的低迷继续给银行带来痛苦。【原文：Hang Seng Bank Ltd., a Hong Kong lender controlled by HSBC Holdings Plc, posted a jump in impairments in the first half, as the city’s commercial property downturn continues to inflict pain on its banks.】

item.title: Klarna 获得英国金融行为监管局颁发的新许可证
item.description: Klarna Group Plc 表示，其英国分部已获得电子货币机构许可证，这将为这家瑞典金融科技公司与 Revolut Ltd. 和 Monzo Bank Ltd. 等公司更直接地争夺零售银行客户奠定基础。【原文：Klarna Group Plc said it has received an electronic money institution license for its UK division, which could lay the ground work for the Swedish fintech to more directly compete against the likes of Revolut Ltd. and Monzo Bank Ltd. for retail bank customers.】

item.title: 英伟达合作伙伴富士康与台湾德科合作推进人工智能发展
item.description: 鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. formed a strategic alliance with Teco Electric & Machinery Co., a pact that should help the iPhone-assembler advance its push into artificial intelligence hardware.】

item.title: 日产警告称扭亏计划和关税不利因素将导致更多亏损
item.description: 日产汽车公司（Nissan Motor Co.）警告称，随着这家陷入困境的汽车制造商推进其代价高昂的扭亏计划，并努力应对美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对汽车进口征收关税的影响，未来将出现可观的亏损。【原文：Nissan Motor Co. warned of sizable losses ahead as the embattled carmaker pushes forward with its costly turnaround plan and grapples with the fallout of US President Donald Trump’s tariffs on car imports.】

item.title: 美联储利率决议前财报黯淡，欧洲股市下挫
item.description: 在投资者等待美联储政策决定的同时，欧洲股市也在一系列令人失望的财报之后下滑。【原文：European stocks slid following a flurry of disappointing earnings, while investors awaited the Federal Reserve’s policy decision.】

item.title: 据称意大利支持依维柯解体，向塔塔和莱昂纳多出售产品
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，意大利政府广泛支持依维柯集团（Iveco Group NV）将其防务部门出售给莱昂纳多股份公司（Leonardo SpA）以及将其商用卡车部门出售给印度塔塔汽车有限公司（Tata Motors Ltd.）的业务分拆计划。【原文：The Italian government is broadly supportive of Iveco Group NV’s plans to break up its business by selling its defense unit to Leonardo SpA and its commercial trucking division to India’s Tata Motors Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: KKR 支持的公司收购海湾资本的中东生育业务
item.description: KKR & Co.支持的一家公司收购了海湾资本公司（Gulf Capital PJSC）在其中东生育业务中的股份，凸显了该地区对特殊医疗服务日益增长的需求。【原文：A firm backed by KKR & Co. has bought Gulf Capital PJSC’s stake in its Middle Eastern fertility business, underscoring the rising demand for specialty medical services in the region.】

item.title: 泰勒-温佩公司的规定表明英国消防安全问题的解决任重道远
item.description: 格伦费尔大火夺走了 72 条人命，在这场悲剧发生八年多之后，英国的房屋建筑商仍在努力消除多年来不安全的建筑做法所带来的长期影响。【原文：More than eight-years on from the tragic Grenfell fire that claimed 72-lives, the UK’s home builders are still grappling with the long fall out from clearing up years of unsafe building practices.】
